thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Wednesday, 04 Apr 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: Chinese ambassador arrives at U.S. State Department

author: Reuters Editorial
title: Chinese ambassador arrives at U.S. State Department
text:
WASHINGTON, April 4 (Reuters) - Chinaâ€™s ambassador to the United States, Cui Tiankai, arrived at the U.S. State Department on Wednesday for talks with Acting Secretary of State John Sullivan amid a deepening U.S.-China trade dispute.
Cui did not respond to reporters questions on arrival. State Department officials said the meeting had been set up before the United States announced new tariffs on Chinese products on Tuesday, a move that provoked Chinese retaliation.
A U.S. trade official said on Wednesday that the United States and China may pursue negotiations to resolve deepening differences over trade, but he declined to say whether any new high-level meetings were planned.
Reporting by Lesley Wroughton and David Brunnstrom Editing by Susan Thomas
